conbody.p:
The System Summary panel on the dashboard summarizes the system's configuration.
System Name: name of the system as identified by
Deployment ID: the S3 bucket ID on AWS where the telemetry-agent, running on the systems, is going to upload the log files to
Serial Number: serial number of the system
Software: name and version of the software
Telemetry Version: the telemetry version used on the system
Platform: name and version of the hardware platform, for example Active Archive 1.0
Switches: the number of switches in the system
Controller Nodes: the number of Controller Nodes in the system
Storage Nodes: the number of Storage Nodes in the system
Storage Enclosures: the number of Storage Enclosures in the system
